title: $10 RP code giveaway! (ONLY OCE SERVER, not clickbait, not fake)
body:
**GIVEAWAY IS CLOSED!**
----------------------------
Alright, STORY TIME! I know $10 is not a very huge value to some of you, but my ~~genius~~ friend recently came back from Australia and bought me $10 RP card and gave it to me as a birthday gift.... Straight to the point, WE PLAY ON NA SERVER. And the RP card is only redeemable for OCE server. You guys should get it, none of me or my friends could benefit from this RP card. 

**CONDITIONS!!!**
Here's the thing though, I want YOU, whoever wants this thing, to make ~100 words (50 words minimum) paragraph (on the comment below!) expressing how dramatically desperate you desire this code. **THE FUNNIER AND _DANKER_ THE BETTER. ** Include gifs and/or memes for +style points.

I will not read any additional comments beyond 24 hours after I posted this thread. When I decide a winner (depends on how many comments i received within this time window, sorry if it took a little longer), I will reply my twitter username to your comment (informing that you're the winner, duh.) and then you will have to STATE your twitter name and proceed to MESSAGE (personally) me, then I can give you the code. (if you dont have a twitter, make one. FOR THE RP!) 

oh, also, if you don't respond to my comment within another 24 hours, I'll pick another winner.

Additional info : the time this thread is posted is 6:00 PM (UTC+7), 17 April 2017.
Good luck!

-----------------------------------------------
UPDATE : Wow, the replies I got are fewer than I expected. But promises are promises, winner is decided! Congratulations to DobbyIsFree! 

GIVEAWAY IS CLOSED

replies.body:
I need this RP because I'm a {{champion:17}} main and I need Cottontail {{champion:17}} be cute asf while I simultaneously tilt the entire enemy team. Also gives extra bonus points when I trash a Level 7 Yasuo, flash mastery, and proceed to desecrate his worthless corpse with beautiful easter eggs, then bathe in his tears {{item:3070}} {{champion:157}} {{item:3070}} . And with the spare $$ I shout an ARAM team a skin boost <3 And because I have no idea how to link memes:

**Me to Me:**
{{champion:17}} I should come up with an original story that's actually funny
**Also me:**
{{champion:31}} SHOW THEM MY TRUE IDENTITY AND INSULT THE DIRTY YASUO MAINS

Let ~~my shrooms~~ the dankness consume you.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Hello Dobby, 

Congratulations! I chose you as a winner! woot?
My twitter username is [@AllouchSukeshi](https://twitter.com/Allouchsukeshi), please reply your twitter username to this comment before sending me a private message so I can verify!

(reminder: if you dont respond within 24 hours of this comment, I will assign another winner)

Woot woot! I panicked because I was asleep (ofc) and didn't realise it had only been 6 hours. I think I made a Twitter @oprahdoge and I'll try flicking you a message now <3

EDIT: Turns out I can't message you if you don't follow me, I followed you so flick me a message?

Woops! Sorry for that

I just followed you! I also sent you a short message, see if things work out

To earn some freebie.

Sit by the closing notice.

I arrived too late.

So Recently, I sent Wicked Lulu to fight some mean faeries, however, she never came back. I recieved an letter at my room at the Institue of War, demanding $10 RP if I ever wanted to see Wicked Lulu back. I was relieved to learn she was still alive, so I quickly went into my bank vault to collect my RP and send it to the Faeries in exchange for Lulu, however, I discovered my vault is empty :(
For this reason I am asking for your help oh High Council, may I please have $10 RP from you to be able to pay the ransom to get Wicked Lulu back?
Yours, -FrozenFruitTube
